name: Black Shroud
desc: Create a cloud of cursed smoke in an area, setting Suffocating and Blind on all characters within.

name: Blood Storm
desc: The sky weeps bloody tears. Bolts of coagulated blood fall on enemy characters in the area, setting Disease and Decaying Touch. Turns all water in the area into blood.

name: Blood Sucker
desc: Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they are healed! Restores up to [X] Vitality.

name: Bone Cage
desc: Increases Physical Armour by [X] and another [X] Physical Armour for each corpse in the area around you.

name: Death Wish
desc: Target character receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their lost Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus. Sets Death Wish for 2 turn(s).

name: Decaying Touch
desc: Deal [X] physical damage to target character. Sets Decay for 2 turn(s), so the target will take piercing damage from healing spells and potions.

name: Grasp of the Starved
desc: Undead hands rise from underground, attacking characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [X] physical damage to each character and sets Crippled for 2 turn(s).

name: Infect
desc: Deal [X] physical damage. Infect a target for 2 turn(s) with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased characters deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Constitution.

name: Last Rites
desc: Sacrifice yourself to bring an ally back to life. Deals [X] piercing damage to you, and resurrects target character with maximum Vitality.

name: Living on the Edge
desc: For 2 turns your character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration. Sets Death Resist for 2 turn(s)

name: Mosquito Storm
desc: Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitos to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing physical damage and healing yourself. Restore up to [X] Vitality, depending on the damage dealt. Set Bleeding for 2 turn(s).

name: Raining Blood
desc: Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies for 2 turn(s). Douse fire surfaces.

name: Raise Bloated Corpse
desc: Target a corpse to raise a bloated cadaver that fights for you. It can explode your target, dealing Physical Damage.

name: Raise Bone Widow
desc: Raise a walking pile of bones which can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking damage buff. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Shackles of Pain
desc: Mark a target so that it will receive all of the damage you receive. Sets Shackles of Pain for 3 turn(s).

name: Silencing Stare
desc: Destroy [X-Y] Magic Armour and Silences all enemies in a cone in front of you. Sets Silenced for 1 turn.

name: Totems of the Necromancer
desc: Spawn bone totems near every enemy (alive or dead) in the area. Bone totems have ranged attacks that deal [x] physical damage.
